    Characters

    • Uses of Character in Characters

      Subclasses of Character in Characters 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BulletBill
      A giant Enemy that flies across the Screen
      class  Enemy
      Extends the Character class to create Enemies
      class  Goomba
      A basic Enemy
      class  Koopa
      A basic Enemy
      class  Mario
      The Character that the user will control
      class  PiranhaPlant
      An Enemy that hides in Pipes and pops out
      class  Thwomp
      An Enemy that stays up high until the player comes near, then drops down

    • Uses of Character in Game

      Methods in Game with parameters of type Character 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Area.removeCharacter(Character c)
      Is used to "kill" a Character, it actually just makes it invisible and not solid to avoid Errors
